messages.start:
Hi, I'm a {}🤖

I'll help you to be aware of changes on www.petheaven.co.za and easily monitor favourite products.

To start monitoring products use /monitor command.
messages.monitor_no_products: 🤷‍♂️ You have no products in your monitoring list, But you can add some.
messages.info_start: ✔️ Choose product which you want to check
messages.add_start: 📲 Send me url of product you want to add
messages.add_wait: 🕵🏻‍♂️ Please wait. I'm looking for your product
messages.add_same_product: 🤦‍♂️ I'm already added this one to your monitoring list earlier
messages.add_error: 😢 Something went wrong...Cannot add this product
messages.remove_start: ✔️ Choose product which you want to remove
